description: This dataset contains health infrastucture related variables from the American Community Survery (ACS) from 2019 to 2022. The variables show information about household infrastructure such as kitchens and plumbing.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: lacking_plumbing_p
variables.description: Percentage of occupied housing units lacking complete pumbling facilities
variables.units: Percent out of total occupied housing units in geography

variables.name: lacking_kitchen_p
variables.description: Percentage of occupied housing units lacking complete pumbling facilities
variables.units: Percent out of total occupied housing units in geography

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
